description: Heritage Eye offers an immersive augmented reality experience that is innovative and unique. It caters to your aspirations and takes you on a virtual tour of cultural heritage sites, showcasing their historical significance. This experience celebrates and introduces authentic heritage, emphasizing its value and promoting a sense of belonging to national identity. Through this journey, you can learn about the story of civilization written by our ancestors. Embark on a unique journey across various cultural, historical, and archaeological monuments, enabling you to discover cultural heritage through a realistic experience full of action, sound, and image.

about.missionDescription: Support the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's ambitious development visions, protecting its cultural and historical heritage that reflects tradition and authenticity, and strive to promote a deep sense of pride in the rich cultural history of this land.

downloadApp.mainDescription: Download the 'Heritage Eye' application for a unique journey and an enjoyable tour of heritage sites and monuments.
